name: Foxy's Adventure (Julie Black)
description:
Foxy's Adventure is a whimsical, bright and colourful cartoon 3D Platformer.

Play as a cute little bushy tailed fox, who is tasked with saving animals trapped by an evil mastermind. Foxy will need to travel to various worlds, depicted by different themed levels, and collect berries and gems, and rescue the trapped animals from a devastating fate. The game is inspired by Crash Bandicoot and Spyro the Dragon.

Features:

  • There are currently 4 levels with different themes including medieval and Egyptian themes, and also a flying level.
  • Different level types - linear levels and semi-open with exploration.
  • Save trapped animals and find collectable gems and berries.
  • Different box types - berry boxes that drop berry collectables, TNT boxes that explode, and bouncing boxes that bounce Foxy into the air like a trampoline.
  • Different enemy types - bugs, carnivorous plants, knights, fire breathing dragon, spiders, scorpions, beetles.
